snippet: Kartweek, held from Christmas to the new year, brought hundreds of drivers to the Florida speedway, including drivers from the Nascar Sprint Cup series.
abstract: Kartweek, held from Christmas to the new year, brought hundreds of drivers to the Florida speedway, including drivers from the Nascar Sprint Cup series.
lead_paragraph: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla. -- Late on the afternoon of Dec. 30, the bags were packed and trailers loaded. Daytona Kartweek was over, and by Saturday morning the historic speedway where it took place would be emptied of cars, 18-wheelers and tents.

headline.main: Karting at Daytona: Fun, but Not Play Time

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
